info.title: FINOS Notion Actions API
info.description: API for accessing FINOS Notion databases through a Vercel backend. Supports querying rows, retrieving a page, and fetching daily reports.

post.summary: Query rows from a Notion database

database_id.description: The Notion database ID to query

page_size.description: Number of rows to fetch. Defaults to 1.

200.description: Parsed and raw results from the database

post.summary: Retrieve all properties from a Notion page

page_id.description: The Notion page ID to retrieve

200.description: Parsed and raw properties from the page
